page.title: 03Whilton Marina
page.content:
The Marina area was built in 1971. At the time it was the largest man-made marina in Europe and today there are 250 narrow boats moored at the marina that people live in. The marina has been developed over the last 25 years and there are a number of new buildings. The area surrounding the marina has a number of small businesses such as the Whilton Locks Carpet Company which occupies the old Marina Restaurant area. Across the main road you fill find a garden store and at the nearby Whilton mill there is Company running Go karting, paintball and quad biking activities.


Ravensthorpe WI
